option.name: originalContent
option.value:
FROM openjdk:21
WORKDIR /usrapp/bin
ENV PORT=6000
# Copiar las clases compiladas COPY /target/classes /usrapp/bin/classes
CMD ["java","-cp","./classes","co.edu.escuelaing.microsptingboot.MicroSptingBoot"]

option.name: updatedContent
